prompts.title: Money Making Prompt #1
prompts.description: Uncover hidden strategies that generate wealth without being widely recognized.
prompts.prompt: What are the most powerful money-making loopholes people overlook?

prompts.title: Money Making Prompt #2
prompts.description: Identify valuable expertise that can be acquired independently and lead to success.
prompts.prompt: What are 10 high-income skills that require zero formal education?

prompts.title: Money Making Prompt #3
prompts.description: Explore how an online business model can thrive in a competitive market.
prompts.prompt: How can a side hustle combining dropshipping and influencer marketing yield $25K/month in the [beauty] industry?

prompts.title: Startup Ideas Prompt #1
prompts.description: Find an innovative approach to generating steady revenue with minimal investment.
prompts.prompt: What unconventional digital product idea can generate $10k/month in the [self-help] market with minimal upfront costs?

prompts.title: Startup Ideas Prompt #2
prompts.description: Design a sustainable business plan that is adaptable to future advancements in technology.
prompts.prompt: Design a 2030-proof business model for [niche] that exploits AI's next unethical breakthrough?

prompts.title: Startup Ideas Prompt #3
prompts.description: Build a profitable venture within a short time frame by leveraging unique opportunities.
prompts.prompt: What morally grey side hustle that could generate $20K/month from [niche] within 90 days?

prompts.title: Trading Prompt #1
prompts.description: Create a system to analyze market fluctuations based on past trends and indicators.
prompts.prompt: Build a mean-reversion algo strategy for [crypto/stock] with Bollinger Bands, ATR trailing stops, and confirmation from stochastic oscillator

prompts.title: Trading Prompt #2
prompts.description: Spot investment opportunities by combining multiple financial metrics and insider data.
prompts.prompt: Identify undervalued stocks in the [sector] using a Piotroski F-score screen combined with insider buying signals and low P/E ratios.

prompts.title: Trading Prompt #3
prompts.description: Use advanced models to predict price changes based on multiple market signals.
prompts.prompt: Predict [asset] price movement for the next [N] hours using an LSTM model trained on OHLCV data, sentiment scores and VIX volatility

prompts.title: Psychological Experiment #1
prompts.description: Investigate unsettling studies that reveal the darker side of human behavior.
prompts.prompt: What's the scariest psychological experiment that was never shut down?

prompts.title: Psychological Experiment #2
prompts.description: Explore the subtle ways of influencing emotions through non-verbal cues.
prompts.prompt: How can you make someone feel guilty without saying a word?

prompts.title: Psychological Experiment #3
prompts.description: Delve into the impact of silent actions in manipulating feelings and responses.
prompts.prompt: How can you make someone feel guilty without saying a word?
